title: Does buying rp have taxes ?
body:
So I bought a gift card Visa today of 75$,
I tryed bying 50euro worth rp, which is 73.87$ (around).
But it says that it got denied by the Card Provider.

I checked on Visaprepaid,
and my card is active, ready to use.

So what I want to know if, it's there any taxes into buying Riot Points?
Because I'm supposed to have the money,  but doesn't work.

Thanks for the answer.

replies.body:
Sometimes there might be a small currency conversion fee which is typically pretty small, but those are typically rather small so I wouldn't think that would be stopping you. There isn't any additional tax added onto those purchases, the prices you see are what will be charged (with the odd exception for currency conversions). 

Double check that you're entering the card in the right place, and if so take a screenshot and shoot it over to our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). With that, they'll be able to see what's going wrong!
